name: Roadside Dinosaur Demolition
description:
Smash some Derelict Roadside Dinosaur Sculptures!

Use mouse to grab chunks of the dinosaur sculptures. Take one chunk at a time if you wish, and see how long you can keep the statues standing! Take turns with a friend!

Press ESC to exit and R to reload (may take a while to reset scene)

Special Thanks to ElasticSea
